Module: node-foursquare/Updates

node-foursquare/Updates

A module for retrieving information about Updates and Notifications from Foursquare.

Source:
/Users/clintandrewhall/Projects/node-foursquare/lib/updates.js, line 1

Methods

<static> getNotifications([params], [accessToken], callback)

Retrieve notifications for the current user.

Source:
/Users/clintandrewhall/Projects/node-foursquare/lib/updates.js, line 42
See:
  • https://developer.foursquare.com/docs/updates/notifications.html
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
params Object <optional>
 An object containing additional parameters. Refer to Foursquare documentation for details on currently supported parameters.
accessToken String <optional>
 The access token provided by Foursquare for the current user.
callback Function The function to call with results, function({Error} error, {Object} results).

<static> getUpdate(updateId, [accessToken], callback)

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
updateId String The id of a Update.
accessToken String <optional>
 The access token provided by Foursquare for the current user.
callback Function The function to call with results, function({Error} error, {Object} results).
